Sponge-based skincare: Create a line of skincare products that utilize the unique properties of sponges to deep clean and purify the skin. The products could include a sponge-based cleanser, toner, and moisturizer, all of which would be gentle on the skin and effective at removing impurities.

Sponge-powered water filtration: Develop a water filtration system that uses sponges to remove impurities and contaminants from water. The sponges would be designed to capture and hold onto impurities, allowing clean water to pass through. This system could be used in homes, communities, or even in developing countries to provide clean drinking water.

Sponge-based cooking utensils: Create a line of cooking utensils that incorporate sponges as the primary material. These utensils could include sponge-based cutting boards, sponges for rolling out dough, and even sponge-based cooking bags for steaming or cooking food. The sponges would be heat-resistant and durable, making them ideal for cooking.

Sponge-based home decor: Create a line of home decor items that incorporate sponges as the primary material. These items could include sponge-based vases, planters, and even sponge-based wall art. The sponges would be molded and shaped to create unique and eye-catching designs.

Sponge-based pet products: Create a line of pet products that utilize the unique properties of sponges to provide comfort and relief for pets. These products could include sponge-based beds, sponge-based toys, and even sponge-based grooming tools. The sponges would be designed to be comfortable and durable, providing a unique and enjoyable experience for pets.
